> Welcome to my vault

> Who am I?

Hi, I'm Rubén a Spanish guy 23 years old, currently living in Spain. A human being who is curious about the world and seeking always to find answers, the nickname defines a part of me.

> What am I doing?

Currently, I'm working as software analyst at APDI GROUP implementing and developing digital solutions for clients in so many fields as Education, Entertainment.

> What are my professional interests?

My professional interests lie in the realms of technology, with a primary focus on Software Engineering and Cybersecurity. This synergy is ideal for developing robust and scalable solutions. I hold a particular interest in Reverse Engineering and Malware Analysis.
